      Method used to get the Board

    • getCell

      public Cell getCell​(int index)
      Method that returns the cell of the board of a given index
      Parameters:
      index - of the cell that needs to be returned
      Returns:
      the cell, or null if the index doesn't exists

    • getNextCellAlongThePath

      public Cell getNextCellAlongThePath​(Cell firstPathCell, Cell secondPathCell)
      Method that, given two neighbouring cells, calculates the next cell along the path made by the first two
      Parameters:
      firstPathCell - the first cell from which the path is calculated
      secondPathCell - the second cell defining the path
      Returns:
      the cell along the path, otherwise null if the cells given to the method were not neighbours

    • getNeighbouringCells

      public java.util.List<Cell> getNeighbouringCells​(Cell cell)
      Method that finds the neighbouring cells of a cell
      Parameters:
      cell - cell of which the method has to calculate the neighbours
      Returns:
      a list containing the indexes of the neighbouring cells of the given cell

    • boardToXMLString

      public java.lang.String boardToXMLString()
      Method that converts the board to a string in XML format
      Returns:
      the board in XML string format
